title: "Chengdu Metro, in Sichuan Province, now accepts face scan payment"
excerpt: "Passengers in Chengdu, capital city of Southwest China's Sichuan Province, can pay by scanning their faces at the turnstile at subway stations from September 1, according to the application released by Chengdu Metro Operation."
